bio:
Chenchen Zhao is an Language Lecturer at NYU Shanghai. She holds an MA from East China Normal University and a BA from Xiamen University.

Zhao’s research interests are teaching Chinese to speakers of other languages and Chinese comprehensive textbooks.

Research Interests

  • Teaching Chinese to speakers of other languages
  • Chinese comprehensive textbooks
  • A comparison on illustrations of Chinese comprehensive textbooks

Courses Taught

  • Elementary Chinese I
  • Elementary Chinese II
  • Elementary Chinese II FoS
  • Elementary Chinese II FoS 2
  • Intermediate Chinese I
  • Intermediate Chinese II

Education

  • MA, Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages, East China Normal University, 2014
  • BA, Arts, Xiamen University, 2011
